snippet: For Clare Tiarsmith, a senior at the Marist School in Atlanta, sustaining her academic performance through the remainder of high school means not succumbing to that dreaded upperclassmen ailment, senioritis.
abstract: For Clare Tiarsmith, a senior at the Marist School in Atlanta, sustaining her academic performance through the remainder of high school means not succumbing to that dreaded upperclassmen ailment, senioritis.

headline.main: Senioritis in Remission, at Least Until the A.P. Exams
